name: Vaadin.ButtonElement

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: Specify that this control should have input focus when the page loads.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

description:
`<vaadin-button>` is a Web Component providing an accessible and customizable button.

```html
<vaadin-button>
</vaadin-button>
```

```js
document.querySelector('vaadin-button').addEventListener('click', () => alert('Hello World!'));
```

### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are exposed for styling:

Part name | Description
----------------|----------------
`label` | The label (text) inside the button
`prefix` | A slot for e.g. an icon before the label
`suffix` | A slot for e.g. an icon after the label


The following attributes are exposed for styling:

Attribute | Description
--------- | -----------
`active` | Set when the button is pressed down, either with mouse, touch or the keyboard.
`disabled` | Set when the button is disabled.
`focus-ring` | Set when the button is focused using the keyboard.
`focused` | Set when the button is focused.

See [ThemableMixin â€“ how to apply styles for shadow parts](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-themable-mixin/wiki)
